job.title: Data Scientist, Product Analytics
job.description: ltpgtAbout TikTokltpgtltpgtTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and TokyoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat Youll Doltpgtltpgt Work with the product team to size the potential impact of problemstosolve for our businessltpgtltpgt Develop comprehensive product metrics and quantitative measurement structure based on product stages and business purposesltpgtltpgt Implement standardized product reports ad hoc queries and data related projectsltpgtltpgt Design and implement reporting dashboards and the associated data pipeline to deliver insights and improve the workflows of internal teamsltpgtltpgt Partner closely with key stakeholders to optimize overall product adoption and performance driven growth Provide suggestions for improvements to align with the business goalltpgtltpgt Measure and visualize the effectiveness of product updates conduct research and analysis on various business processes to identify business problems and further provide optimization suggestions to improve operating efficiencyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWho Were Looking Forltpgtltpgt 2 years industry experienceltpgtltpgt Bachelors degree or equivalent practical experienceltpgtltpgt Ability to conduct rigorous analysis and communicate conclusions to both technical and nontechnical audiencesltpgtltpgt Experience in business analysis and product analysisltpgtltpgt Proficiency in SQL Pythonltpgtltpgt Solid communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively with internal teams in a crosscultural and crossfunctional environmentltpgtltpgt Proven ability to succeed in an innovative and fastpaced environmentltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEven better ifltpgtltpgt Masters degree in data analytics related fieldsltpgtltpgt Product management experience is a plusltpgt
